subject: Automobile Racing
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: The Formula One driver Robert Kubica will need up to a year to regain full use of his right hand, according to a surgeon who operated on him after his car hit a wall at high speed.
snippet: The Formula One driver Robert Kubica will need up to a year to regain full use of his right hand, according to a surgeon who operated on him after his car hit a wall at high speed.
